description:
Log your miles in the Nine Trails. These versatile, time-honoured shorts are built for intense activity. The stretch fabric is breathable and resists snagging, so it's a great choice for trail-running through low forest or brush. The built-in brief offers support and is lined for next-to-skin comfort and to lower the risk of chafing.Body is 91% recycled polyester with 9% spandex in a 4-way stretch, with a durable water repellency finish.Built-in boxer brief lining is soft, breathable polyester that resists chafing. Polygiene odour control treatment keeps it smelling fresh.Interior drawcord waist lets you get a comfortable fit.2 front, 1 back pocket all with zippered closures.Reflective heat-transfer logos increase your visibility.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: Patagonia Nine Trails Shorts - Men's
